statements: UPDATE market_sentiment_data SET sentiment_score = 0.75, trade_strategy = 'Hold' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE market_sentiment_data SET trade_strategy = 'Buy', sentiment_score = 0.85 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE market_sentiment_data SET stock_symbol='AAPL', sentiment_score=0.75 WHERE id=1;

UPDATE real_time_sentiment_data SET sentiment_score = 0.75 WHERE asset_name = 'Bitcoin';
UPDATE trading_strategies SET description = 'Long-term strategy to capitalize on market trends' WHERE strategy_id = 1;

UPDATE trading_strategies SET description = 'This strategy involves buying low and selling high' WHERE strategy_name = 'Trend Following';

strategy_name = 'Safe Strategy'
